participant_1.background:
I love to keep up with my friends on social media.
my parents are both dead.
I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play.
I have a large family, and we love to go on adventures together.
i have a wife and a 4 year old son.

participant_2.background:
I'm a social media enthusiast looking to learn how to use it to grow my business.
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

content.text: I am doing well! I love to use social media to keep up with my friends and family. How about you?
I am doing well too! I also love social media, and I am trying to learn how to use it to grow my business.
That's awesome! What kind of business do you have?
I am a cake decorator, and I am trying to learn how to use social media to get more orders.
That's great! I am sure you will do great! I love cake, and I would love to try one of yours!
Thank you! I would love to send you one! I am also really proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
That's amazing! I am sure Gila is very lucky to have you as her parent.
Thank you! I am really proud of her. She is a great kid.
I am sure she is! I also love that you prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch your foreign films without interruption.
Thank you! I love my alone time, and I love watching foreign films.
I am sure you do! It sounds like you have a great life.
I do! I am very happy with my life.
I am glad to hear that
